Body:
df = get_data()
for method in {'mean_historical_return', 'ema_historical_return',
    'james_stein_shrinkage', 'capm_return'}:
    mu = expected_returns.return_model(df, method=method)
    assert isinstance(mu, pd.Series)
    assert list(mu.index) == list(df.columns)
    assert mu.notnull().all()
    assert mu.dtype == 'float64'
    mu2 = expected_returns.return_model(expected_returns.
        returns_from_prices(df), method=method, returns_data=True)
    pd.testing.assert_series_equal(mu, mu2)
